author: cms-l1t-offline
body:
This is a 80X PR COMBO for all the developments in L1T including tower-counting algorithm at L1T needed for pPb run.  This is a superset of the #16318 and is provided here for completion or for merging if deemed not problematic in size.
- Tower-Counting L1T emulator, packer and unpacker for Layer2 and uGT
  - Addition in DataFormat
  - Requires utm library r47119-xsd310-patch
  - developments mostly concerning L1TNtuples used for local validation

In order to compile even in CMSSW_8_0_X_2016-10-21-1100,
needed to install utm library locally, instructions [here](https://gitlab.cern.ch/cms-l1t-utm/utm)
title: 80x L1T COMBO: l1t-integration-v88 + HI run - tower-counting emulator/unpacker/packer in Layer2 and uGT
